name: Minifield
description:
"Minifield" is a simple platformer game with well-built mechanics and simple rules but hard difficulty. Try to get to the finish in 70 levels split to 5 worlds avoiding traps and enemies and collect valuable gems which upgrades main character. There are also 26 achievements to gain. Can you handle it?

2.0.2 (24th July, 2018)

- fixed spring jump force
- fixed calculations about movement speed and jump force, gems weren't counting to the sum

A, D, keys / left or right arrow key - movement
A key / up arrow key - jump
F - fullscreen / windowed mode
P - pause game

Available in two languages: Polish and English.
Powered by Phaser.

This game is also available on Kongregate, Newgrounds and Coolmath Games!
